sections.heading: GRASSROOTS
sections.content: This is a grassroots gathering of concerned, local individuals. We've no sponsors, no funding, and no political agenda. We're simply here to raise awareness about the migrant crisis and to demand action from our government

sections.heading: LOCAL.
sections.content: From the area? Come on down. These are community-driven events, made by the locals, to tackle local concerns.

sections.heading: PEACEFUL
sections.content: We're peaceful protesters, not rioters. We're here to raise awareness and demand action, not to cause chaos or destruction.

sections.heading: LEGAL
sections.content: We're legal protesters, not anarchists. We're here to raise awareness and demand action, not to break the law or cause chaos.

sections.heading: SYSTEM
sections.content: The system is unfit for purpose. The safety of women, children, and vulnerable people is compromised by the very people our government puts first.
